name: Gay Sex Adventures - Episode 5
description:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters.
Embark on Tony’s Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single man.
The story continues at the same Gay Resort, with Tony getting a full-body massage from the hot bartender.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.
EPISODE 5
Following a friend's tip, Tony jets off to a renowned gay-only Resort in the Caribbean.
The story continues with Tony feeling exhausted after a lively night with Maverick beneath the sheets. The insatiable exhibitionist exploited his body until the early hours, leaving him sore and tender all over.
Fortunately, the hot bartender he met yesterday feels generous on his day off and offers a full-body massage to ease Tony’s discomfort.

Will Tony get a happy ending to his massage?
Follow his Sex Adventure and find out!
